      • sendTronTransaction

        public TransactionHash sendTronTransaction​(boolean testnet,
                                           TransferTron body)
                                    throws IOException,
                                           InterruptedException,
                                           ExecutionException
        Send Tron transaction to the blockchain. This method broadcasts signed transaction to the blockchain. This operation is irreversible.
        Parameters:
        testnet - mainnet or testnet version
        body - content of the transaction to broadcast
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
        ExecutionException

        public String prepareTronSignedTransaction​(boolean testnet,
                                           TransferTron body)
                                    throws com.google.protobuf.InvalidProtocolBufferException
        Sign Tron transaction with private keys locally. Nothing is broadcast to the blockchain.
        Parameters:
        testnet - mainnet or testnet version
        body - content of the transaction to broadcast
